item1.description: We are kind of famous for this one. It makes butter look great on the table.

item4.description: Wearing a wooden lid and this new cup is perfect as a marmelade jar.

item5.description: We love this new size of cup. Nice to hold with two hands.

item6.description: We use this size of jar for coffee beans. What would you use it for?

item7.description: We find it perfect for warm milk for the coffee.

item8.description: We serve warm milk for the coffee in this one.

item10.description: One piece of the finest oakwood, made in to this handy and smooth working grinder, AND on top of this, a piece of our handdecorated ceramic. Inside we mounted the ceramic Chrushgrind, which has a warranty of 25 years, and it takes salt OR pepper .....or whatever you need grinded.
